biography_text: SCHNEIDER, Brad, a Representative from Illinois; born in Denver, Denver County, Colo., August 20, 1961; graduated from Cherry Creek High School, Denver, Colo., 1979; B.S., Northwestern University, Evanston, Ill., 1983; M.B.A., Northwestern University, Evanston, Ill., 1985; businessman; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress (January 3, 2013-January 3, 2015); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Fourteenth Congress in 2014; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Fifteenth Congress (January 3, 2017-present).
